Posts.Content: I'm not the type to go online and share my thoughts and views about medicine, but I could not resist this one. BJ Hardman, Chairman and CEO of Sanarus, has spent more than a decade working on technology to help women with breast cancer. A few months ago she discovered a lump and she followed her own advice - get it checked right away. Needless to say she was very surprised when her diagnoses came back positive. She put together a very powerful video on youtube and I invite you to check it out.Â  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iWxbVqDgsd8
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer CEO diagnosed with breast cancer
